subject: Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: LaRod Stephens-Howling scored two touchdowns in the fourth quarter and Conor Lee kicked four field goals Saturday for Pittsburgh, which rallied for a 34-24 victory over Syracuse.
snippet: LaRod Stephens-Howling scored two touchdowns in the fourth quarter and Conor Lee kicked four field goals Saturday for Pittsburgh, which rallied for a 34-24 victory over Syracuse.
